channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: Student Pantry Hours for Winter Break
item.description: Date: Friday, December 19, 2025 11:00 AM - The Pantry will be open until December 23rd (1-3pm) and then will be closed till January 6th when we will resume normal operating hours.
item.author: Students

item.title: New Dining Events for Finals!
item.description: Rensselaer Dining has added new events to help you power through final exams. Click the link above to find out more about all the events during finals!
item.author: Students

item.title: Division of Human Resources Professional Development Seminar – “Certifications & Skill Development in Percipio”
item.description:
“Certifications & Skill Development in Percipio” This course introduces the tools available in Percipio to support growth through certifications and skill benchmarks. You’ll learn how to identify relevant certifications and use benchmark assessments to measure current knowledge. Perfect for employees and supervisors alike, this session will help you navigate the platform’s upskilling features and align learning with career development objectives.

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
item.author: Faculty and Staff
